control_attributes.control_description: The information system protects wireless access to the system using authentication of [Selection (one or more): users; devices] and encryption.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system enforces information-sharing decisions by authorized users based on access authorizations of sharing partners and access restrictions on information to be shared.
